Ta'orata, injila o ya tomadera rabera kacha theke tomadera prati nayila hayeche ta [1] pratistha na kara paryanta tomara kono bhittira upara na'o [2].â€™ Ara apanara rabera kacha theke apanara prati ya nayila kara hayeche ta tadera anekera abadhyata o kuphari'i brd'dhi karabe.
